Nightlight/Trinity::

Nightlight left Trinity on floor while she kindly said her "Now stay 
here and don't move, I have to help Burning Hammer"

Nightlight went where Burning Hammer was, took his arms and dragged 
him towards a cr.

Trinity started to walk towards the exit.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightlight/trinity:
> 
> Trinity woke up inside the cr, she felt better but she was weak, 
the 
> little one started to scratch and meowed "Let me go out!! please 
let 
> me go out!!1"
> 
> Nightlight heard her and opened the cr "Heya"said Trinity when she 
> saw her and Nightlight took her in arms wTrinity asked her"where's 
> Grounded? and Windlord is Uncle aerotaur ok? are all them ok?"
> 
> "Aerotaur was injured"said sadly Nightlight "but he would be ok 
soon"
> 
> "But he won't die, will he? he won't go to matrix?"said Trinity 
while 
> tears was rolling down.
> 
> "He will be ok"said Nightlight while she hugged her "He will be ok 
> soon"
> 
> "IT?S MY FAULT!!!!" shouted Trinity while she cried
> 
> "No it isn't..."said Nightlight while she left the cr's room.
